content:
Based on the execution logs, here's the report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
- Steam engine at position (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at position (-4.5, 16.0) containing coal fuel
- Offshore pump at position (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Multiple electricity poles forming electricity group (id=7486)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup
- Burner mining drill at position (-18.0, -53.0)
- Output chest at position (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output inserter at position (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at position (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.0, -61.0)
- Output chest at position (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output inserter at position (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at position (-22.5, -58.5) containing copper plates

### Science Pack Production Setup
- Assembling machine at position (8.5, 13.5) producing automation science packs
- Input chest at position (5.5, 13.5)
- Input inserter at position (6.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at position (11.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter at position (10.5, 13.5)
- Lab for research at position not specified
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- When extracting items from storage, ensure the target chest contains the requested items
- Verify item availability before attempting extraction operations

### Production Line Issues
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices (mining drills, inserters) to maintain continuous operation
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials (copper plates, iron gear wheels) for science pack production

### Assembly Machine Operation
- Keep track of ingredient shortages in assembly machines
- Maintain proper input ratios of copper plates and iron gear wheels for science pack production

### Storage Management
- Implement better inventory tracking to avoid attempting to extract non-existent items
- Monitor storage chest contents regularly to maintain production flow

### Fuel Management
- Keep coal supplies available for all burner-type entities
- Implement regular refueling cycles for mining drills and inserters
